rows.label: tev068701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha what she is doing here.

rows.label: tev068701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha for information about Oblivia.

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha for information about Oblivia.

rows.label: tev068701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Vi Sezha about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0001
rows.name:
I am standing guard in case the Ganglion or indigens
rear their ugly heads.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0002
rows.name:
My people need no fancy contraptions. Our senses
are so finely honed that should any foe approach,
we would realize it immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0003
rows.name:
I immediately understood that you had approached
our location based on the echoes of your footfalls,
for example.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0008
rows.name: Hmm. What am I to do now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0009
rows.name:
My dear friend has journeyed to a land of death out of
a sense of Wrothian duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0010
rows.name: I do not think I can bear to lose her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yet to dissuade her from so noble a task would be
a breach of Wrothian custom and law![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0012
rows.name: I dare not even speak of such feelings to my brethren.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0013
rows.name:
But you are human. Would you be so kind as to hear
my plea once I have had a moment to gather my
thoughts together?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0018
rows.name:
From my guard post, I can see the saltat known as
Wenzel, the Inebriated atop yonder pillar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Though he seems to be performing some foul rite,
Ge Jewhe is of a mind to cross swords with the beast.
I believe such actions to be far too dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0024
rows.name:
Whether we're standing watch together, supping,
scouting, or even just taking our nightly repose...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0025
rows.name: I will be ever at Ge Jewhe's side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0026
rows.name:
Such is the vow I made when we exchanged silver
bracelets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Could anything make me happier?
Perhaps if Ge Jewhe and I could become one soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0031
rows.name:
From my guard post, I can see the saltat known as
Wenzel, the Inebriated atop yonder pillar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0032
rows.name:
He appears to be performing some dark rite.
An attempt to resurrect the dead, perhaps?
But surely that is not possible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0037
rows.name:
You need not worry. I assure you, I won't think any
more foolish thoughts of following her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0038
rows.name:
After all, that would only bring shame to Ge Jewhe,
who lived proudly and valiantly until her last breath.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0039
rows.name:
So no matter how much pain this life brings,
I shall live it until its end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068701_MSG0040
rows.name: And I will ever treasure the memory of Ge Jewhe.[ST:wait ]
